thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 72 of 625
thread.title: Brenda Lopez

author: Brenda Lopez
title: Brenda Lopez
text:
I love the quality, look and fell of the clothes - absolutely fabulous! It is the reason I keep coming back.
Hate the magazine subscriptions. It's annoying getting magazines every two weeks for two years to have to remember to turn off the subscription - for which I have been unsuccessful at turning off ahead of schedule! Is there anyway, to flip the option so that I don't have to remember to remove from my purchase every time I purchase?
